description: Very nice trail heading up McKee Peak to a rock bluff where Eagles fly beside you at eye level in front of the rock bluff.Great place to sit and have a packed lunch. This whole area is frequented by many mountain bikers so stay alert!
directions: Take the Whatcom Rd. exit from Highway no.1 and head North on Whatcom raod up the hill to the very end at the top. Park your vehicle and strart up the trail at the end between the concrete barriers. You need to head to your right and up the hill to connect to the main trail called the "autobahn". Many mountain bikes on this trail.
title: McKee Peak
